    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddReplyController
    Controller class for the add reply modal window.
    AddressDAO
    AddressDAO is a Data Access Object for managing addresses in the database.
    AddressDTO
    Data Transfer Object for Address information.
    AddressException
    Custom exception class for handling address-related errors.
    AddRestaurantController
    Controller class for the add restaurant view.
    AddReviewController
    Controller class for the add review modal window.
    ClientTK
    Main application class for TheKnife client.
    ClientUtil
    Utility class for client-side operations and mock data.
    CuisineType
    Enumeration of main cuisine types for restaurants in TheKnife system.
    DBConnection
    DBConnection class provides a singleton connection to the database and manages the connection attempts.
    DBConnector
    DBConnector class helps to connect to the database providing an easy way to get the database connection given the credentials.
    GenericResultsComponent
    A generic JavaFX component for displaying search results.
    LoginController
    Controller class for the login view.
    MyAreaController
    Controller class for the My Area view.
    RegistrationController
    Controller class for the registration view.
    RestaurantCardComponent
    A custom JavaFX component representing a restaurant card in search results.
    RestaurantDAO
    Data Access Object for restaurant-related database operations.
    RestaurantDTO
    Data Transfer Object for Restaurant information.
    RestaurantInfoController
    Controller class for the restaurant information view.
    RestaurantService
    Remote interface for restaurant-related operations in TheKnife system.
    RestaurantServiceImpl
    Implementation of the RestaurantService interface for managing restaurant-related operations.
    ReviewCardComponent
    A custom JavaFX component representing a review card.
    ReviewDAO
    Data Access Object for managing restaurant reviews.
    ReviewDTO
    Data Transfer Object for Review information.
    ReviewService
    Remote interface for review-related operations in TheKnife system.
    ReviewServiceImpl
    Implementation of the ReviewService interface for managing restaurant reviews.
    SearchController
    Controller class for the restaurant search view.
    SearchCriteriaDTO
    Data Transfer Object for restaurant search criteria.
    SearchCriteriaDTO.Builder
    Nested Builder class for constructing SearchCriteriaDTO instances.
    ServerAddress
    ServerAddress class for managing the RMI registry connection.
    ServerTK
    Server class for TheKnife application
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object for managing user data in the database.
    UserDTO
    Data Transfer Object for User information.
    UserException
    Custom exception class for handling user-related errors.
    UserRoleDTO
    Data Transfer Object for User Roles.
    UserService
    Remote interface for user-related operations in TheKnife system.
    UserServiceImpl
    Implementation of the UserService interface for handling user-related operations.
    UserSession
    Maintains the current user's session information on the client side.
